solution_line_template: Rhonda caught half as many necklaces as did Boudreaux, or {boudreaux_necklaces}/{half_divisor}=<<{boudreaux_necklaces}/{half_divisor}={rhonda_necklaces}>>{rhonda_necklaces} necklaces.
Three times as many necklaces as Rhonda caught is {rhonda_necklaces}*{three_times_multiplier}=<<{rhonda_necklaces}*{three_times_multiplier}={three_times_rhonda}>>{three_times_rhonda} necklaces.
Thus, Latch caught four less than three times as many necklaces as did Rhonda, for a total of {three_times_rhonda}-{four_less}={latch_necklaces} necklaces.
